revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Station P2 Geek PC.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Mini Geek PC |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.stationpc.com/product/stationp2 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Stationpc |model = Station |submodelappend = yes |submodel = P2 (8GB+64GB) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AX1500 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer, Mini PC |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = H8N-AP6275S |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3568; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A55 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |gpu1chip1 = Mali;-G52 2EE; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = ARM |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- GPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = <!-- gpu speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC64G-TX29; |flash1size = 64 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = eMMC |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q256JWEIQ; |flash2size = 32 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9HKNNNFBMMUDR; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.19.193;Android 11;
|exp_if_types = M.2 (NGFF), SATA 3.0, USB 3.1, USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = WI-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.0, Audio 3.5mm out, Micro SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, RS485, RS232, external antennas, metal case, power switch |addchip = High-PSRR 500mA LDO;Powtech;PT5108;;1;,,, Power Management IC;Rockchip;RK809-5;;1;,,, PCI Express Clock;Diodes Inc;PI6C557-03;;1;,,, I2C RTC;Haoyu Microelectronics;HYM8563;;1;,,, USB 3.1 SuperSpeed 10 Gbps Switch;ON Semi;FUSB340;;1;,,, 3V-5.5V RS232 Transceiver;Maxim Integrated;MAX3232;;1;,,, 4-port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Terminus Technology;FE1.1;;1;,,, 5A Synchronous Step-Down DC-DC Converter;Tctek;TCS4525;;1;,,, 2A 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy;SY8089A;;1;,,, Programmable USB Type-C Controller w/PD;ON Semi;FUSB302;;1;,,, 3A 500KHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8113B;;1;,,, 5.5V 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;4;,,, 3A 24V 500kHZ Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2315;;1;,,, Fixed 5V-8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/100mA LDO;MPS;NB679;;1;,,, Fixed 3.3V-8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/100mA LDO;MPS;NB680;;1;,,, 3.3V Powered 10Mbps RS-485 Transceiver;Maxim Integrated;MAX3485;;1;,,, 4-Line Uni-directional Transient Voltage Suppressor;Will Semiconductor;ESD5304D;;7;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator w/Auto Direction and ESD Protection;Union Semiconductor;UM3304;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = set at first login |defaultpass = set at first login |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = T-Chip |manuf_model = ROC-RK3568-PC |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Ubuntu 20.04
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/07/2021 |estreldate = 07/2021 |estprice = 239 |upc = 730243972894 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B09936XM3P |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = SparkLAN AP6275S |rad1modif = SDIO 3.0 |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43752; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax |rad1ax = 574/1201 |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.400~2.4835 or 5.150~5.850 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3568 :Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A55 (@1.8GHz) *GPU: ''Mali-G52 2EE'' (OpenGL ES3.2) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) :NPU 0.8Tops@INT8 *Memory: 8GB (SDRAM) LPDDR4 *Storage: 16MB SPI NOR, 64GB eMMC, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card, SATA 3.0 *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *PCIe: 1x M.2 (PCIe 2.0) for NVMe SSD (2242/2280, Key B) *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB Type-C (OTG), 2x USB 2.0 ports *GPIO: 1x 26-pin headers *Power Source: 12V/2A barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/03/29/station-p2-arm-mini-pc-dual-gbe-m-2-sata-ssd-8gb-ram/ ''Station P2 Arm mini PC'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/tiny-mini-pc-shows-off-rockchip-rk3566/ ''Tiny mini-PC shows off Rockchip RK3566'' on '''LinuxGizmos''' ] *[https://liliputing.com/2021/03/firefly-station-p2-mini-pc-coming-soon-with-rk3568-processor-and-android-and-ubuntu-support.html ''Firefly Station P2 mini PC with RK3568 processor'' on '''Liliputing''']
==See also== *[[Station M1 Geek PC]] • [[Rockchip]] RK3328 • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/10/30/station-p1-m1-fanless-mini-pcs-run-media-or-desktop-optimized-android-os/ SNX] *[[Station M2 Geek PC]] • [[Rockchip]] RK3566 • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/07/13/station-m2-business-card-sized-android-11-mini-pc-also-supports-ubuntu-buildroot/ SNX] *[[Station P1 Geek PC]] • [[Rockchip]] RK3399 • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/10/30/station-p1-m1-fanless-mini-pcs-run-media-or-desktop-optimized-android-os/ SNX] *[[Station P2 Geek PC]] • [[Rockchip]] RK3568 • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/03/29/station-p2-arm-mini-pc-dual-gbe-m-2-sata-ssd-8gb-ram/ SNX]
